Name: Duline
About the game: Duline is a pure and simple logic game, expressing unexpected complexity through its level design. 31 unique levels. The game is quite challenging so be prepared. Rules: You can place blue or orange blocks anywhere except white tiles. The goal is to cover all the green tiles on the board with the least 'chains' used. A chain is when blocks of the same colour touch in the main cardinal directions. Chains over 12 in length are invalid!
Meta Title: Duline: May 2, 2022, Isaac Andrews and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Duline? Check out the release date (May 2, 2022), developer insights from Isaac Andrews, and a complete game summary.
